CustomField.description: Display the priority of the product on the right channel.
CustomField.formula:
/* Define the priority of the Product for the right channel - The channel is the BU Target for Budget Assortment and the BU source for others - Be carefull the customer could choose to have different names for the BU Channel eg HMSM... you have to adapt the formula */
CASE(if( Assortment_type__c = 'Budget', Assortment_BU__r.BU_Target__r.Name , Assortment_BU__r.BU_source__r.Name ), 'HM', text(Product__r.PriorityHM__c) , 'SM', text(Product__r.Priority_SM__c) , 'Proxi', text( Product__r.PriorityConv__c ) , 'Drive', text( Product__r.PriorityDrive__c ) , 'LAD', text( Product__r.PriorityWeb__c ) , 'Cash&Carry', text( Product__r.PriorityCashCarry__c ), null)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: La formule peut devoir être adaptée en fonction des noms des BU circuits
CustomField.label: Priority
